help_cnt.message:
• Go to Pomagalo.com and login with your details. If you aren't registered, please register from the registration link in the Pomagalo's site.
  • Select a document, which you want to download.
  • Under the document viewer will apear a box, from which you can download the document.
  • Select document's data type for download.
  • ... and the document will be downloaded.
  • That's all!
